LanguageData.Forien_NaturalizeGenome_CycleMightKillTu: {PAWN_labelShort} will be killed as they are still regenerating their genes!
LanguageData.Forien_NaturalizeGenome_CycleMightKill: Be advised that this operation might kill the pawn if they are still regenerating their genes.
LanguageData.Forien_NaturalizeGenome_OrderToPod_GeneR: Each gene will have {0}% chance of being converted to endogene (germline).
LanguageData.Forien_NaturalizeGenome_OrderToPod_natur: Archite genes will be converted to endogenes (germline). It will not be possible to inherit them anyway.
LanguageData.Forien_NaturalizeGenome_OrderToPod_rando: Naturalization Cycle has {0}% chance to backfire and add random type of Chemical Dependency xenogene.
LanguageData.Forien_NaturalizeGenome_OrderToPod_Coold: Naturalization Cycle will result in {0}, which by itself won't do anything, but will require colonist to not mess with their genome for a while.
LanguageData.Forien_NaturalizeGenome_OrderToPod_pawnW: Due to {PAWN_labelShort} having their {1}, they will die on completion of Naturalization Cycle.
